amendment.description: To provide for a responsibility of the Joint Chiefs of Staff as military advisors to the Homeland Security Council.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2568 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2568 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12790) To provide for a responsibility of the Joint Chiefs of Staff as military advisors to the Homeland Security Council.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2568 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2568 proposed by Senator Warner.
